mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER ( MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_PW, MEM_ZIPCODE, MEM_ADDR, MEM_ADDR_D, MEM_PHONE, MEM_NICK, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_ACCEPT_E ) VALUES ( #{mem_id}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_zipcode}, #{mem_addr}, #{mem_addr_d}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_nick}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_accept_e} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_PW, MEM_ZIPCODE, MEM_ADDR, MEM_ADDR_D, MEM_PHONE, MEM_NICK, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_ACCEPT_E, MEM_POINT, MEM_DATE_SUB, MEM_DATE_UP, MEM_DATE_LAST, MEM_AUTHCODE FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
